extendedInfo.description: Enter the Fear Club at your own risk. Turn your Android device into a mobile Fright Fest. HD horror movies at your finger tips including Independent and rarely-viewed, face-ripping, heart stopping movies that will haunt you in your sleep. More movies being added every day so the screams will only get louder for our exclusive Fear Club members. We dare you to join!!! As our content acquisition czar scours the world to bring the titles to you, please remember that the titles in our library are as diverse as our viewership. We canât promise that you will like every film, but we are unwavering in our commitment to bring every well-made film to you. When you write your review, please remember that movie making is a difficult business and many people worked incredibly hard to put together that film for you! Weâd love to hear from you. If you have compliments for us, suggestions for titles from any country in the world or if we simply missed a mark on something, contact us at suggestions@idistribute.net Sit back, grab the popcorn and enjoy the show! Fear Club runs on select Android devices running OS 2.3 or higher. If you havent upgraded yet - this is a great reason to do it now!

reviews.title: Not anuf free movies
reviews.comment: Cool, only prob is that there is only 5 free movies. The rest must b payed 4. I hardly ever have a lot of muny on my phone. Others probably don\'t ether. Pls add more free movies and it will b *****
reviews.author: Logan Kelly

reviews.title: Nice movies...
reviews.comment: I like the variety and prices. But none of the movies play. All it does is load as if it\'s going to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: An app worthy of my desires. Keep them coming boys, I crave blood, terror, madness, and pure evil!!! Buahahahaha!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic Horror flicks app
reviews.comment: Just rented a couple of movies. Impressed with it so far. Two clicks and I am watching a movie. Streams smooth with really good quality. Found classics and some new, cool thrillers. I am not much into lot of bloody scenes and I did not play those movies. Surprised that this great little App is not advertised much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too expensive for the movies available
reviews.comment: $1.99 rental for each crappy B/C movie. No thanks, I\'ll pass.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poop
reviews.comment: You hi to hey for everything 4 dumb
reviews.author: Arshya Zakeri
